label: 雅楽寮
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A bureau in the Jibushō (Civil Affairs Minsitry).  The assigned task of the Bureau of Music's administrative staff and its corps of singing, dancing, and instrumental music teachers was to select and train male and female pformers of elegant and correct" music and dancing (p. 809). [HW: also read utazukasa、gagakuryō] [治部省]"
